timeline.raw_data: {"type": "email", "timestamp": "2025-09-11T19:34:00", "sender_email": "shikha.s@amberstudent.com", "recipient_email": "ygktymaaaa@gmail.com", "subject": "Your Room Is Reserved \u2013 Complete Your Booking at iQ Tufnell House, London", "message": "Dear Yui Katayama,\\nWarm greetings.\\n\\nWe are pleased to inform you that your booking for the Bronze Ensuite Plus at iQ Tufnell House, London has been successfully processed. However, at the time of processing, the only available option was the Bronze Ensuite Plus (43 weeks at \u00a3340/week), and this was the last room left for this duration.\\n\\nIf you are happy to proceed, kindly reply to this email so that we can transfer your deposit to the iQ portal.\\n\\nAdditionally, we have been unable to reach you via WhatsApp. Could you please share an alternative WhatsApp number for quicker communication?\\n\\nIf you need any assistance during the process, please don\u2019t hesitate to get in touch.
